last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: Murray decides that he needs to give it one last push with Bex.

name: I Want My Wife Back
overview: Murray is a nice guy. Everyone says so. So no-one is more surprised than Murray when, on her 40th birthday, his wife walks out on him. So begins Murray's quest to discover what went wrong and how to win her back.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: While arranging a surprise 40th birthday party for his beloved wife Bex, Murray hears that she is leaving him. He desperately tries to find her and to cancel the party - but it is too late.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Murray tries to persuade Bex that a holiday is just what they need to repair their relationship, but she leaves him heartbroken at the airport. The couple try to hide the truth from their families with unexpected results.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Murray goes to great lengths to see Bex, but she is not best pleased when she finds out what he's been up to.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Bex agrees to go for dinner with Murray at Lorenzo's, the restaurant where he proposed.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Bex moves in with her sister Keeley whilst Murray makes a big decision about his future.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Murray decides that he needs to give it one last push with Bex.
